item.title: ‘We want to trust what we’ve heard’: Farmers remain unsettled on trade, even after China’s biggest U.S. soybean purchase in two years
item.description: China’s U.S. soybean haul has exceeded 1 million metric tons this month. Trump wants China to buy 12 million tons by the end of the year.

item.title: Brazil hails ‘historic victory’ after months of pressure as Trump removes 40% tariffs on coffee imports
item.description: The President initially hiked tariffs in protest of the persecution of former President Jair Bolsonaro, who is imprisoned for attempting to stage a co...

item.title: After calling Mamdani a ‘100% Communist lunatic,’ Trump now says ‘we’re looking for the same things’
item.description: The Republican president and new Democratic star have indicated an openness to come together for the city they've both called home.

item.title: Transportation chief offers advice to increasingly angry Americans: ‘Let’s maybe go back to an era where we didn’t wear our pajamas to the airport’
item.description: "Sometimes you just have to ask people, 'Hey, let's maybe go back to an era where we didn't wear our pajamas to the airport.'"

item.title: Just 776 FAA employees will get Trump’s $10,000 bonus, but unions say thousands who worked during the shutdown were left out
item.description: The payments will be received no later than Dec. 9, the Federal Aviation Administration said.
